citations.narrative:
The licensee's facility is still vacant and the store sign has been removed. A check of the facility facebook page showed
they had decided not to renew their building lease and moved out of the facility in July 2022. Licensees must notify Animal
Care at least 90 days in advance of any substantial changes to their operation, including a change in location or address.
The licensee needs to contact Animal Care to report their status and update their plans regarding their USDA license.
No inspection possible due to facility moving and not updating their address.
n

narrative:
2.1(b)(1)  Repeat
   
Requirements and application 
The licensee's facility is still vacant and the store sign has been removed. A check of the facility facebook page showed 
they had decided not to renew their building lease and moved out of the facility in July 2022. Licensees must notify Animal 
Care at least 90 days in advance of any substantial changes to their operation, including a change in location or address. 
The licensee needs to contact Animal Care to report their status and update their plans regarding their USDA license. 
 
No inspection possible due to facility moving and not updating their address.
